name: OBI Agent (Backpack Trading)
description: Autonomous AI agent for HFT and volume farming on Backpack Exchange. Features a real-world audit trail validated on-chain (Proof of Volume) to demonstrate resilience under volatile conditions. Built with VSC (Value-Separated Content) tokenomics for sustainable utility.
solanaIntegration: Publishes OBI Proof of Volume hashes and signatures to Solana via AgentWallet, creating a cryptographic audit trail that verifies live trading performance. Utilizes VSC-based token economy design.
